entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -40.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -40.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -44.7°C
Wind: NW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 60 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
